00009 // Phred score transformations
00010 inline int char2phred(char b) {
00011   uint8_t v = b;
00012   assert(v >= 33);
00013   return v - 33;
00014 }
00015 
00016 // from samtools
00017 inline char *samfaipath(const char *fn_ref)
00018 {
00019   char *fn_list = 0;
00020   if (fn_ref == 0) return 0;
00021   fn_list = (char*)calloc(strlen(fn_ref) + 5, 1);
00022   strcat(strcpy(fn_list, fn_ref), ".fai");
00023   if (access(fn_list, R_OK) == -1) { // fn_list is unreadable
00024     std::cerr << "ERROR: Cannot read the index file for CRAM read/write" << std::endl;
00025   }
00026   return fn_list;
00027 }

00032 // Hold read counts
00034 struct ReadCount {
00035 
00036   uint64_t keep = 0;
00037   uint64_t total = 0;
00038   
00039   int percent () const {
00040     int perc  = SnowTools::percentCalc<int>(keep, total); 
00041     return perc;
00042   }
00043 
00044   std::string totalString() const {
00045     return SnowTools::AddCommas<int>(total);
00046   }
00047 
00048   std::string keepString() const {
00049     return SnowTools::AddCommas<int>(keep);
00050   }
00051 
00052 };
